metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3629 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Libcontainer 1.6.0, as used in Docker Engine, allows local users to escape containerization ("mount namespace breakout") and write to arbitrary file on the host system via a symlink attack in an image when respawning a container.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4').
